title: CIDER Women’s Ripped Jeans High Waisted Distressed Baggy Straight Wide Leg Pants
description: High Waist Design: These jeans feature a high-waisted design that enhances your natural waistline while providing a secure and comfortable fit. Perfectly paired with any top, they offer a flattering silhouette that elongates your legs and complements your figure effortlessly.

Ripped Style: The stylish ripped details add a trendy and edgy look to these jeans. Perfect for casual outings, school, or picnics, the distressing gives off an effortlessly cool vibe that sets these jeans apart from the regular denim options.

Premium Denim Material: Made from a high-quality blend of cotton, viscose, polyester, and modal, these jeans ensure durability and comfort. The thick, opaque fabric provides a robust yet soft feel, making them suitable for everyday wear while ensuring they last through many washes.

Versatile Straight Leg: The straight leg cut provides a modern and relaxed fit that transitions well from day to night. These jeans can be dressed up with heels for a chic look or kept casual with sneakers, making them an essential wardrobe staple.

Functional Pockets: Equipped with multiple pockets, these jeans combine style with functionality. The pockets are designed to be spacious and secure, providing ample space for your essentials, making them practical for any occasion.
